description.value: Your time in forest or jungle canopies has taught you how to scramble across branches with sure feet. You gain a climb Speed of 10 feet. If you also have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Cave Climber] ancestry feat, your total climb Speed increases to your land Speed when climbing trees.

value.value: tailed goblin or treedweller goblin heritage
